title: Invalid Ban Error
body:
Everytime ive gone to lock in a ban with 5-10 seconds remaining, im getting an error that its not a valid ban.
Its not picked on my team and its not banned already so if you guys can fix that in your "fixed" ranked system, that would be great. Already lost 50LP because of this error and a promo game. 
its a major screw you to me.


Also, you should address these other issues too:

A) Champion select is bugged. You go to lock in champs and (for me at least) has had a good 80% invalid ban error forcing a dodge (thanks RITO)
B) 2 Days in and I've had mostly intentional feeders and trolls. Flamers had heaps off but i just mute that crap rather than listening to them cry.
C) When choosing the champ to play, I've had the same error as banning forcing dodges (THANKS AGAIN RITO)
D) Lobby consists of people wanting different roles non stop, so there's nothing but trades and role swapping different to the ones the "prioritize"
E) While selecting the roles wanted, ive only ever gotten them probs 3-5 times a day. Choosing Support and Top to only often get jungle and mid.

If anything, ranked is more buggy than fixed.

Otherwise RITO is just a satire group at this point

replies.body:
Hey there Blaster Joker,

Sorry to hear you've been experiencing some issues with the game, to rule out any issues with your install specifically could you please [run a repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq6) on your game for me.

Otherwise this might be a bug with the new champion select, if that's the case this thread would be better suited for the [Bug Reports board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report)
Now, onto your other points.

>B) 2 Days in and I've had mostly intentional feeders and trolls. Flamers had heaps off but i just mute that crap rather than listening to them cry.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} If anyone's being toxic in your games, muting them is probably the best thing you can do, don't forget to report them after the game ends :)

>C) When choosing the champ to play, I've had the same error as banning forcing dodges (THANKS AGAIN RITO)>

Report a bug (as above)

>D) Lobby consists of people wanting different roles non stop, so there's nothing but trades and role swapping different to the ones the "prioritize"
E) While selecting the roles wanted, ive only ever gotten them probs 3-5 times a day. Choosing Support and Top to only often get jungle and mid.

This will happen unfortunately, there's no way around it.

Hope this helps,
Seph
